subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry scored 35 points as Golden State coasted to a 132-98 victory at Quicken Loans Arena, where the Warriors clinched the N.B.A. title last season.
snippet: Stephen Curry scored 35 points as Golden State coasted to a 132-98 victory at Quicken Loans Arena, where the Warriors clinched the N.B.A. title last season.
